name: The Last Roll (SILithium Games)
description:
This should be a game for the Weekly Game Jam 149, but I was a little to late, so I have to Upload it this way.

This is a Little project I might work on later, because there are still many Bugs and there are only 2 levels.

Controls:

A: Left

D: Right

Space: Jump

J: Shoot

Please don't judge me for the bad gameplay. I'm a 12 year old boy trying to learn scripting and failing.

*Update:

I won't work on it anymore.
